attributes.action: GET ALL FOOTBALL RELATED DEATH MOCKING PAGES REMOVED OFF FACEBOOK
attributes.additional_details: this e-petition is to stop all football related death moking pages on facebook whether its a disaster ,player or players family member , there is no place for such vile pages and facebook should be removing them this is not freedom of speech , also it needs to be stopped from being sung on the terrices lets get respect back into football ,!!
